main.name: Justin Suderman
main.description: I am looking for a full time career where I can implement the skills that I have acquired.  Interested in working with a great team where I can continue to learn and grow.  Skills include HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, React.js, Node.js, C#, .Net, Database Theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Command Line, and Git
main.bio: I just moved to the Bay Area from the east coast. Seeking a full time career that I can use my skills and continue to grow. I really enjoy working with a great team to strive for a common goal.  Sports and coaching are my other passions in life.  Hoping to be able to continue that in the Bay Area as well.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact or ask a question, please comment down below!

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
